trans-unit.source: Provides an object that enables two <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls to form a connection.
This class cannot be inherited.
In the Web Parts control set, a connection is a link or association between two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> (or other server or user) controls that enables them to share data.
trans-unit.target: 在 Web 部件控件集，连接是链接或两个之间的关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>（或其他服务器或用户） 控件，使它们可以共享数据。

trans-unit.source: This ability to share data allows connected controls to be used in ways that exceed the functionality offered by the isolated controls.
trans-unit.target: 共享数据这种能力使得连接超过提供独立的控件的功能的方式使用的控件。

trans-unit.source: For example, if one control provides postal code data, and another control can read that data and provide local weather information based on the postal code, then the connected capability of the two controls provides more value to users.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果一个控件提供了邮政编码数据，而另一个控件可以读取该数据并提供本地天气信息基于邮政编码，然后连接的功能的两个控件提供更大的价值对用户。

trans-unit.source: To extend this example, other controls could be created that also display information based on a postal code, such as a control with links to local news, and all these controls that can work with postal code data could share data with the single control that provides a postal code.
trans-unit.target: 若要扩展此示例中，无法创建其他控件还基于邮政编码，如具有链接到本地新闻的控件的显示信息，并可以使用的邮政编码数据的所有这些控件可以与提供的单个控件共享数据邮政编码。

trans-unit.source: End users of Web Parts applications can create and manage connections between all such compatible controls directly from a Web browser, using the standard connections user interface (UI) provided by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control, or using a custom UI provided by a developer.
trans-unit.target: Web 部件应用程序的最终用户可以创建和管理直接从 Web 浏览器，使用标准连接用户界面 (UI) 提供的所有此类兼容的控件之间的连接<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>控件，或使用提供的自定义用户界面开发人员。

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> class overview is a general statement of the basic details for creating a connection.
trans-unit.target: 这<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>类概述是用于创建连接的基本详细信息的常规语句。

trans-unit.source: For more on specific components and requirements involved in creating connections, see [Web Parts Connections Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98cfd0f-ebd6-4871-89d5-abbd2cdef67b), or see the reference classes and code examples mentioned in the following discussion.
trans-unit.target: 有关特定组件和创建连接的涉及到的要求的详细信息，请参阅[Web 部件连接概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98cfd0f-ebd6-4871-89d5-abbd2cdef67b)，或请参阅引用类和代码示例下面的讨论中所述。

trans-unit.source: There are several fundamental aspects of a Web Parts connection:
trans-unit.target: 有几个 Web 部件连接中基本方面：

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 两个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: Every Web Parts connection consists of two controls.
trans-unit.target: 每个 Web 部件连接由两个控件组成。

trans-unit.source: It is possible for a control to participate in more than one connection simultaneously, but every single connection consists of exactly two controls.
trans-unit.target: 一个控件，用于同时参与多个连接可能但每个单个连接由两个控件组成。

trans-unit.source: The controls can derive directly from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> base class, or they can be other server controls, including ASP.NET controls, custom server controls, and user controls.
trans-unit.target: 控件可以直接从派生<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>基类，也可以是其他服务器控件，包括 ASP.NET 控件、 自定义服务器控件和用户控件。

trans-unit.source: Controls that do not derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class, if placed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone, are automatically wrapped with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> object at run time, which enables them to inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class and function as run-time <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 不要从派生的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>类，如果置于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>区域，使用自动包装<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>对象在运行时，使其能够从继承<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>类和函数作为运行时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: Controls residing in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones.
trans-unit.target: 控件位于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>区域。

trans-unit.source: Both <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls and any other type of server control must reside in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone to be able to participate in Web Parts connections (and most other Web Parts features).
trans-unit.target: 同时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件和任何其他类型的服务器控件必须驻留在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>区域能够参与 Web 部件连接 （和大多数其他 Web 部件功能）。

trans-unit.source: Consumers and providers.
trans-unit.target: 使用者和提供程序。

trans-unit.source: In every Web Parts connection there are two controls: a provider of data and a consumer of data.
trans-unit.target: 每个 Web 部件连接中有两个控件： 数据和数据的使用者的提供程序。

trans-unit.source: The provider furnishes data to the consumer through a specified callback method that returns data in the form of an interface.
trans-unit.target: 提供程序数据提供给使用者通过接口的形式返回数据的指定的回调方法。

trans-unit.source: (For an example of how to create and specify the callback method, see the Example section of this topic.) This callback method is known as a provider connection point.
trans-unit.target: （有关如何创建和指定的回调方法的示例，请参阅本主题的示例部分）。此回调方法被称为提供程序连接点。

trans-unit.source: The details of this connection point (its "friendly" name, an ID, and the type of the returned interface) are contained in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> object associated with the provider control.
trans-unit.target: 此连接点 （其"友好的"名称、 ID 和返回的接口的类型） 的详细信息包含在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>与提供程序控件关联的对象。

trans-unit.source: The consumer receives the data through a specified method that can accept an instance of the interface.
trans-unit.target: 使用者通过可以接受接口的实例的指定方法将接收数据。

trans-unit.source: This method is known as a consumer connection point, and the details of the connection point (name, ID, and type of interface) are contained in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> object associated with the consumer control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法被称为使用者连接点，以及连接点 （名称、 ID 和的接口类型） 的详细信息包含在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>与使用者控件关联的对象。

trans-unit.source: Compatible controls or a valid transformer.
trans-unit.target: 兼容的控件或有效的转换器。

trans-unit.source: For a connection to work, the consumer and provider must either be compatible (meaning that their specified connection point methods can work with the same type of interface), or there must be a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> object capable of translating the type offered by the provider into a type understood by the consumer.
trans-unit.target: 若要连接，使用者和提供程序必须是兼容 （即其指定的连接点方法可以使用相同类型的接口） 或必须是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>对象支持的转换由提供的类型转换为使用者理解为类型的提供程序。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> 对象。

trans-unit.source: For a connection to exist, there must be an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> class that contains references to the provider and consumer controls, along with the details of their connection points.
trans-unit.target: 可用于存在，连接必须有的实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>类，其中包含对提供程序和使用者的控制，以及它们的连接点的详细信息的引用。

trans-unit.source: If the provider and consumer are incompatible and instead use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> object to connect, the connection references the transformer.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供程序和使用者不兼容，并且改用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>对象进行连接，则连接引用转换器。

trans-unit.source: A means of establishing the connection.
trans-unit.target: 建立连接的方法。

trans-unit.source: After compatible consumer and provider controls have been properly designed with connection point methods and placed in a zone, and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object is available, the last basic step necessary is to initiate the connection.
trans-unit.target: 兼容的使用者和提供程序控件已正确连接点方法在设计和放置在区域中之后, 和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>对象都不可用，最后一个必要的基本步骤是发起的连接。

trans-unit.source: One way this can happen is for users to create the connection through the UI.
trans-unit.target: 发生这种情况的一种方法是对用户创建的连接通过用户界面。

trans-unit.source: If you place an `<asp:connectionszone>` element on the page, and the other required components for a connection are in place, at run time a user can switch the page into connect display mode, click a connect verb on the verbs menu of either the provider or consumer, and a connection UI (based on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control) will appear.
trans-unit.target: 如果你将放置`<asp:connectionszone>`元素上的网页和其他所需的连接的组件是到位，在运行时用户可以将页切换到连接的显示模式，单击连接上的谓词提供程序或使用者的谓词菜单和一个连接用户界面 (基于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>控件) 将出现。

trans-unit.source: Through this UI, the user can initiate the connection.
trans-unit.target: 通过此 UI 中，用户可以发起的连接。

trans-unit.source: Another way to initiate the connection is to do it programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 启动连接另一种方法是以编程方式执行。

trans-unit.source: In either case, whether through the UI or programmatically, the underlying method that initiates the connection is the same.
trans-unit.target: 在任一情况下，是否通过 UI 或以编程方式，基础方法，启动的连接是相同的。

trans-unit.source: The application calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A> method (or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A> method if using a transformer) on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control, passing to it the provider, the consumer, and their respective connection point objects, and the method returns a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A>方法 (或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A>方法如果使用转换器) 上<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制，并向它传递提供程序、 使用者和及其各自的连接点对象，并且该方法返回<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> class defines an object that encapsulates the essential details of a connection between two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>类定义一个对象，封装之间两个连接的重要详细信息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: The class consists almost entirely of properties related to the details of a particular connection.
trans-unit.target: 类包含几乎完全与一个特定连接的详细信息相关的属性。

trans-unit.source: Several properties concern the consumer control in a connection.
trans-unit.target: 多个属性涉及连接中的使用者控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.Consumer%2A> property references the consumer control itself, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ConsumerID%2A> property references the consumer's ID.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.Consumer%2A>属性引用自身，使用者控件和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ConsumerID%2A>属性将引用使用者的 id。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> object, which contains the details of the consumer's connection point, is referenced by the consumer's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>对象，包含使用者的连接点的详细信息，该对象引用的使用者的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ConsumerConnectionPointID%2A> property references the ID of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ConsumerConnectionPointID%2A>属性引用的 ID<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>对象。

trans-unit.source: All these consumer-related connection properties must have a value assigned to them to create a connection.
trans-unit.target: 所有这些与用户相关的连接属性必须具有值分配给他们创建的连接。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> class also has several properties that relate to the provider control in a connection, and these correspond to the properties for a consumer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>类还具有与在连接中，该提供程序控件相关的多个属性，这些属性与对应的使用者。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.Provider%2A> property references the provider control itself, while the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ProviderID%2A> property references its ID.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.Provider%2A>属性引用的提供者控件本身，而<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ProviderID%2A>属性引用其 id。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ProviderConnectionPoint%2A> property references the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> object, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ProviderConnectionPointID%2A> property references the ID of the provider's connection point.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ProviderConnectionPoint%2A>属性引用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>对象，与<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ProviderConnectionPointID%2A>属性引用的提供程序的连接点的 ID。

trans-unit.source: Several properties concern the state of the connection.
trans-unit.target: 多个属性涉及连接的状态。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsActive%2A> property indicates whether the connection is active (currently exchanging data) or inactive (still connected but not actively sharing data).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsActive%2A>属性指示连接是否处于活动状态 （当前交换数据） 或处于非活动状态 （仍已连接但不是主动共享数据）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared%2A> property indicates whether the connection is a shared (available to all users of a page) or a user-specific connection, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic%2A> property indicates whether the control is static (declared in the page markup and thus permanent) or dynamic (created programmatically, meaning that it can be deleted).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared%2A>属性指示连接是否共享 （适用于页的所有用户） 或特定于用户的连接，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic%2A>属性指示控件是静态的 （声明中的页标记并因此是永久） 或动态 (以编程方式创建，这意味着它可以 deleted)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a simple connection between two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建两个之间的简单连接<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates three ways of forming a connection: declaratively, by placing tags for the connection in the markup of the Web page; programmatically, by creating the connection in code; and through the UI, by placing a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control on the page, which enables users to establish a connection.
trans-unit.target: 该示例演示建立连接的三种方式： 声明方式，通过将连接标记放置在网页; 的标记以编程方式在代码; 中创建连接和 UI，通过将放置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>控件在页上，这使得用户能够建立连接。

trans-unit.source: The code example has four parts:
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例包含四个部分：

trans-unit.source: A user control that enables you to change the Web Parts display mode on a page.
trans-unit.target: 用户控件，使你能够更改 Web 部件页面上显示模式。

trans-unit.source: Source code for an interface and two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection.
trans-unit.target: 源接口和两个代码<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制充当提供程序和连接的使用者。

trans-unit.source: A Web page to host all the controls and run the code example.
trans-unit.target: 网页上承载的控件和运行的代码示例。

trans-unit.source: An explanation of how to run the example page.
trans-unit.target: 如何运行该示例页的说明。

trans-unit.source: The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例的第一部分是使用户能够更改在网页上的显示模式的用户控件。

trans-unit.source: Save the following source code to an .ascx file, giving it the file name that is assigned to the `Src` attribute of the `Register` directive for this user control, which is near the top of the hosting Web page.
trans-unit.target: 将以下源代码保存到一个.ascx 文件中，将其分配到的文件名称`Src`属性`Register`指令为此用户控件，即托管的 Web 页面顶部附近。

trans-unit.source: For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息显示在此控件模式和源代码的说明，请参见[演练： 在 Web 部件页面上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。

trans-unit.source: The second part of the code example is the source code for the interface and controls.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例的第二部分是接口和控件的源代码。

trans-unit.source: The source file contains a simple interface named `IZipCode`.
trans-unit.target: 源文件包含名为一个简单的界面`IZipCode`。

trans-unit.source: There is also a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class named `ZipCodeWebPart` that implements the interface and acts as the provider control.
trans-unit.target: 此外，还有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>类名为`ZipCodeWebPart`，实现接口，并充当提供程序控制。

trans-unit.source: Its `ProvideIZipCode` method is the callback method that implements the interface's only member.
trans-unit.target: 其`ProvideIZipCode`方法是实现接口的唯一成员的回调方法。

trans-unit.source: The method simply returns an instance of the interface.
trans-unit.target: 方法只返回接口的实例。

trans-unit.source: Note that the method is marked with a `ConnectionProvider` attribute in its metadata.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，该方法将标有`ConnectionProvider`其元数据中的属性。

trans-unit.source: This is the mechanism for identifying the method as the callback method for the provider's connection point.
trans-unit.target: 这是用于将方法标识为提供程序的连接点的回调方法的机制。

trans-unit.source: The other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class is named `WeatherWebPart`, and it acts as the consumer for the connection.
trans-unit.target: 其他<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>类命名为`WeatherWebPart`，并且它可作为连接的使用者。

trans-unit.source: This class has a method named `GetZipCode` that gets an instance of the `IZipCode` interface from the provider control.
trans-unit.target: 此类具有一个名为方法`GetZipCode`获取的实例`IZipCode`从提供者控件的接口。

trans-unit.source: Note that this method is marked as the consumer's connection point method with a `ConnectionConsumer` attribute in its metadata.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此方法作为使用者的连接点方法标记为`ConnectionConsumer`其元数据中的属性。

trans-unit.source: For the code example to run, you must compile this source code.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。

trans-unit.source: You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache.
trans-unit.target: 你可以显式编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将动态编译运行时将源代码。

trans-unit.source: This code example uses dynamic compilation.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例使用动态编译。

trans-unit.source: For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08).
trans-unit.target: 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。

trans-unit.source: The third part of the code example is the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例的第三部分是网页。

trans-unit.source: Near the top are the `Register` directives for the user control and the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 顶部附近是`Register`用户控制和自定义的指令<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: Because the example assumes dynamic compilation of the controls, the source code for the controls should be in an App_Code subfolder; the `Register` tag in the page references only an arbitrary tag prefix and the namespace of the controls.
trans-unit.target: 该示例假定的控件的动态编译，因为控件的源代码应在 App_Code 子文件夹中;`Register`页中的标记引用仅任意标记前缀和控件的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: The custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls (the provider and consumer) are declared within the Web page's `<asp:webpartzone>` element, inside a `<zonetemplate>` element.
trans-unit.target: 自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件 （提供程序和使用者） 中声明，网页的`<asp:webpartzone>`元素中，内部`<zonetemplate>`元素。

trans-unit.source: The page provides three ways to form a connection between the custom controls.
trans-unit.target: 页提供了三种方式自定义控件之间的连接。

trans-unit.source: The first method is declarative.
trans-unit.target: 第一种方法是声明性。

trans-unit.source: In the markup for the page, a <`StaticConnections>` element is declared, and within that is an `<asp:WebPartConnections>` element, with the various consumer and provider details of the connection specified as attributes.
trans-unit.target: 在页中，标记 <`StaticConnections>`元素声明，并且在其中为`<asp:WebPartConnections>`元素，与为属性指定的连接的各种使用者和提供程序详细信息。

trans-unit.source: This is one way to create a connection, by declaring it directly in the Web page, specifically within the `<asp:WebPartManager>` element.
trans-unit.target: 这是一种方法创建的连接，具体而言是在直接在 Web 页中，声明`<asp:WebPartManager>`元素。

trans-unit.source: Because of this static connection, a connection between the two custom controls is created immediately the first time the page loads.
trans-unit.target: 由于此静态连接，首次加载页面时立即创建两个自定义控件之间的连接。

trans-unit.source: A second method for forming a connection between the controls is provided by the `<asp:connectionszone>` element in the page.
trans-unit.target: 构成控件之间的连接的第二种由`<asp:connectionszone>`在页中的元素。

trans-unit.source: If a user switches a page into connect display mode at run time, and clicks a connect verb on one of the custom controls, the `<asp:connectionszone>` element automatically renders the UI for creating a connection.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户在运行时，将页切换为连接的显示模式，单击上的一个自定义控件的连接谓词`<asp:connectionszone>`元素自动呈现用于创建连接的用户界面。

trans-unit.source: The page also demonstrates a third way of creating a connection, which is to do it programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 该页还演示创建连接，这是以编程方式执行操作的第三个方法。

trans-unit.source: In the `Button1_Click` method, the code creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> object for the provider control, and retrieves its connection point details by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.GetProviderConnectionPoints%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 在`Button1_Click`方法，该代码创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>对象的提供程序控制和检索其连接点的详细信息通过调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.GetProviderConnectionPoints%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: It carries out a similar task for the consumer control, calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.GetConsumerConnectionPoints%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 它执行类似任务的使用者控件中，调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.GetConsumerConnectionPoints%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Finally, it creates the new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: 最后，它会创建新<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>对象通过调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件。

trans-unit.source: After you load the Web page in a browser, the first connection already exists because it is declared within the `<StaticConnections>` element.
trans-unit.target: 加载网页浏览器中之后，第一个连接已经存在，因为它在内声明`<StaticConnections>`元素。

trans-unit.source: Enter some text in the **ZIP Code Provider** control, and it will be displayed in the consumer control.
trans-unit.target: 输入中的某些文本**ZIP 代码提供程序**控制，以及它将显示在使用者控件。

trans-unit.source: Next, disconnect the two controls.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，断开连接两个控件。

trans-unit.source: Using the **Display Mode** drop-down list control, change the page to connect display mode.
trans-unit.target: 使用**显示模式**下拉列表控件中，更改页后，可以连接的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: Click the verbs menu (represented by a downward arrow in the title bar) for each of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, and notice that each has a **Connect** option.
trans-unit.target: 单击 （由标题栏中的向下箭头） 的谓词菜单为每个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件，并请注意，每个都**连接**选项。

trans-unit.source: This is a connect verb, which appears in the verbs menu only when the page is in connect mode.
trans-unit.target: 这是显示的谓词菜单中的连接动词仅页位于在连接模式下。

trans-unit.source: Click the connect verb on one of the controls, and the connection UI provided by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control appears.
trans-unit.target: 单击其中一个控件，并连接提供的用户界面上的连接谓词<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>控件的外观。

trans-unit.source: Click the **Disconnect** button to end the static connection between the controls.
trans-unit.target: 单击**断开连接**按钮以结束控件之间的静态连接。

trans-unit.source: Use the **Display Mode** control to return the page to browse mode.
trans-unit.target: 使用**显示模式**控件来返回到浏览模式的页。

trans-unit.source: Try to enter some new text in the provider again, and note that because the controls are disconnected, the text fails to update in the consumer control.
trans-unit.target: 尝试一些新的文本提供程序中重新输入，并请注意，控件会断开的连接，因为文本无法更新使用者控件中。

trans-unit.source: Next, use the same method as above to switch the page into connect display mode again.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，使用按上面所述的相同方法将页切换到连接的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: Click a connect verb on one of the controls.
trans-unit.target: 单击上每个控件的连接谓词。

trans-unit.source: Click the **Create a Connection** link, and use the UI provided by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control to create a connection between the controls.
trans-unit.target: 单击**创建连接**链接，并使用提供的用户界面<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>控件创建控件之间的连接。

trans-unit.source: This is the second method for creating a connection.
trans-unit.target: 这是创建连接的第二个方法。

trans-unit.source: Note that as soon as the connection is formed, the last string you entered in the provider control (that failed to appear because the controls were disconnected) suddenly appears in the consumer, because the connection has been recreated.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，一旦建立连接，最后一个的字符串你输入提供程序控件 （即会显示，因为控件已断开连接失败） 中会立即出现在使用者，因为已重新创建连接。

trans-unit.source: Click the **Disconnect** button to end the current connection that you just created.
trans-unit.target: 单击**断开连接**按钮以结束当前你刚刚创建的连接。

trans-unit.source: Return the page to browse mode.
trans-unit.target: 返回页后，可以浏览模式。

trans-unit.source: Enter some new text in the provider to demonstrate that the text is not updated, and that the controls are again disconnected.
trans-unit.target: 在要演示，将不会更新文本，并且控件再次断开连接的提供程序中输入一些新的文本。

trans-unit.source: Return the page to connect display mode.
trans-unit.target: 返回页后，可以连接的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: Instead of clicking a connect verb, click the **Connect WebPart Controls** button, which illustrates the third method of forming a connection.
trans-unit.target: 而是单击连接谓词，单击**连接 web 部件控件**按钮，说明了建立连接的第三个方法。

trans-unit.source: This approach connects the controls programmatically in one simple step without having to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法而无需使用连接以编程方式在一个简单的步骤中的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>控件。

trans-unit.source: Note that as the connection is created, the last string you entered in the provider suddenly appears in the consumer control.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，创建连接时，你突然输入提供程序中的最后一个字符串显示在使用者控件中。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> class.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.%23ctor%2A> constructor is public so that the ASP.NET parser can create an instance when a connection is declared in the markup of a Web page; this constructor is not intended to be used in developer code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.%23ctor%2A>构造函数是公共的以便在网页上的标记中声明连接时，ASP.NET 分析器可以创建实例; 此构造函数不应在开发人员代码中使用。

trans-unit.source: When you want to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object programmatically, you should use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method provided in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果想要创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>对象以编程方式，应使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>中提供的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件。

trans-unit.source: These methods handle the many details of creating a connection, and return a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object.
trans-unit.target: 这些方法处理创建连接的许多详细信息，返回<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.%23ctor%2A> constructor for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> class sets the values of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic%2A> properties to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.%23ctor%2A>构造函数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>类设置的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic%2A>属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: Thus the default state of a new connection is to be static (meaning that it is declared in the markup of the containing Web page) and shared (visible to all users of the page).
trans-unit.target: 因此新的连接的默认状态将是静态 （这意味着在包含的 Web 页的标记中声明），并共享 （页上的所有用户可见）。

trans-unit.source: This will be the case when you add a connection in the typical scenario, by declaring the connection in the markup of the page with an `<asp:webpartconnection>` element.
trans-unit.target: 通过声明标记中的页的连接，在典型的方案中，添加连接时，会遇到这种情况`<asp:webpartconnection>`元素。

trans-unit.source: However, in other circumstances a connection will have different values for these properties.
trans-unit.target: 但是，在其他情况下连接将具有这些属性的不同值。

trans-unit.source: For example, when you add a connection programmatically by creating the connection object in code, and the user is viewing the page in the default user personalization scope, the connection is created as a dynamic, per-user(visible only to the specific user) connection.
trans-unit.target: 例如，当你添加连接以编程方式通过在代码中，创建连接对象以及用户在默认用户个性化设置作用域中查看页上，则连接该创建作为动态的每个 user(visible only to the specific user)连接。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic%2A> properties are read-only, and these properties that determine the nature of a connection are set internally by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control depending on how a connection is created (declaratively in the page markup, or programmatically through your code or the user interface).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic%2A>属性是只读的且这些属性用于确定连接的性质内部设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>具体取决于如何创建连接的控件 (以声明方式在页标记中，或以编程方式通过你的代码或用户界面）。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> object that is acting as the consumer control in a connection.
A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> that represents the Web Parts control acting as the consumer in a connection.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> ，表示作为连接中使用者的 Web 部件控件。

trans-unit.source: Every Web Parts connection consists of two controls that share data.
trans-unit.target: 每个 Web 部件连接中包含的共享数据的两个控件。

trans-unit.source: One control acts as the provider of data, and the other control acts as a consumer, receiving and processing the data from the provider.
trans-unit.target: 一个控件充当数据，提供程序和其他控件充当使用者，接收和处理从提供程序的数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.Consumer%2A> property gets a reference to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control acting as a consumer in a connection relationship.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.Consumer%2A>属性获取的引用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制作为连接关系中的使用者。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the programmatic use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.Consumer%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式使用的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.Consumer%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The code example has four parts:
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例包含四个部分：

trans-unit.source: A user control that enables you to change the Web Parts display mode on a page.
trans-unit.target: 用户控件，使你能够更改 Web 部件页面上显示模式。

trans-unit.source: Source code for an interface and two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection.
trans-unit.target: 源接口和两个代码<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制充当提供程序和连接的使用者。

trans-unit.source: A Web page to host all the controls and run the code example.
trans-unit.target: 网页上承载的控件和运行的代码示例。

trans-unit.source: An explanation of how to run the example page.
trans-unit.target: 如何运行该示例页的说明。

trans-unit.source: The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例的第一部分是使用户能够更改在网页上的显示模式的用户控件。

trans-unit.source: Save the following source code to an .ascx file, giving it the file name that is assigned to the `Src` attribute of the `Register` directive for this user control, which is near the top of the hosting Web page.
trans-unit.target: 将以下源代码保存到一个.ascx 文件中，将其分配到的文件名称`Src`属性`Register`指令为此用户控件，即托管的 Web 页面顶部附近。

trans-unit.source: For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息显示在此控件模式和源代码的说明，请参见[演练： 在 Web 部件页面上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。

trans-unit.source: The second part of the code example is the source code for the two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls that serve as the consumer and the provider for the connection, and an interface used for the connection points.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例的第二部分是对这两个源代码<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>充当使用者和提供程序连接和用于连接点的接口的控件。

trans-unit.source: For the code example to run, you must compile this source code.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。

trans-unit.source: You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache.
trans-unit.target: 你可以显式编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将动态编译运行时将源代码。

trans-unit.source: This code example uses dynamic compilation.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例使用动态编译。

trans-unit.source: For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08).
trans-unit.target: 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。

trans-unit.source: The third part of the code example is the code for the Web page that hosts the controls and demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.Consumer%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例的第三部分是所承载控件并演示如何使用的 Web 页的代码<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.Consumer%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Near the top of the page are the `Register` directives for the user control and the custom controls.
trans-unit.target: 页面顶部附近是`Register`用户控制和自定义控件的指令。

trans-unit.source: Because this example uses dynamic compilation, the `Register` directive for the source file does not need to reference an assembly name; it includes only an arbitrary tag prefix and the namespace of the controls.
trans-unit.target: 由于本示例使用动态编译`Register`源文件的文件名的指令不需要引用程序集名称; 它包括仅任意标记前缀和控件的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: In the `Button2_Click` method, the code accesses the connection object through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control, and gets a reference to the consumer control.
trans-unit.target: 在`Button2_Click`方法中，代码访问连接对象，通过<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制，并获取对使用者控件的引用。

trans-unit.source: After you load the page in a browser, use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch the page to connect mode.
trans-unit.target: 加载浏览器中后，使用**显示模式**下拉列表控件，以将页切换到连接模式。

trans-unit.source: Click the verbs menu (represented by the downward arrow in the title bar) on one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, and click the connect verb.
trans-unit.target: 单击 （由标题栏中的向下箭头） 之一上的谓词菜单<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件，并单击连接谓词。

trans-unit.source: Use the **Connect WebPart Controls** button, or the provided connection user interface (UI), to create a connection between the two controls.
trans-unit.target: 使用**连接 web 部件控件**按钮或提供的连接用户界面 (UI) 中，创建两个控件之间的连接。

trans-unit.source: Click the **Display Consumer Info** button to run the code that demonstrates the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.Consumer%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 单击**显示使用者信息**按钮以运行演示代码<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.Consumer%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The length of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ConsumerID" /> property is zero.
Gets the object that serves as a connection point for a control that is acting as a consumer in a connection.
A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint" /> associated with the consumer control in a connection.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint" />与连接中使用者控件关联。

trans-unit.source: One of the required steps for creating a connection between two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls is to create connection points for each control.
trans-unit.target: 用于创建两个连接所需的步骤之一<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件是创建每个控件的连接点。

trans-unit.source: The consumer connection point is an object that contains the information about how to connect to the control acting as a consumer.
trans-unit.target: 使用者连接点是包含有关如何连接到充当使用者的控件的信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: In the consumer's source code, one of the methods must be identified with the `ConnectionConsumer` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 在使用者的源代码，一种方法必须标识与`ConnectionConsumer`属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> object that is associated with a consumer control contains details about the method and the attribute, including an ID for the method, a display name for use in the user interface (UI), and what type of interface the method can retrieve.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>与使用者控件关联的对象包含有关方法和属性，包括的方法，在用户界面 (UI) 中使用的显示名称的 ID 的详细信息和哪种类型的接口方法可以检索。

trans-unit.source: This set of information about the consumer, its method for forming connections, and the type of interface it understands, collectively forms a consumer connection point.
trans-unit.target: 此组的使用者有关的信息，其用于形成连接和了解，接口的类型方法共同形成了使用者连接点。

trans-unit.source: By default, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> object can connect to only one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> object at a time.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>对象可连接到仅一个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>对象一次。

trans-unit.source: A consumer could have multiple methods identified as possible consumer connection points, but a consumer can only participate in one connection as a consumer (hence, only one of its consumer connection points can be active) at a time.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以有多个方法标识为可能的使用者连接点，但使用者仅可参与一个连接为使用者 （因此，仅其中一个其使用者连接点可以处于活动状态） 一次。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> can connect to any number of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> objects.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>可以连接到任意数量的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>对象。

trans-unit.source: This default behavior can be changed by overriding the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionConsumerAttribute.AllowsMultipleConnections%2A> property on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionConsumerAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过替代来更改此默认行为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionConsumerAttribute.AllowsMultipleConnections%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionConsumerAttribute>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the programmatic use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式使用的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The example has four parts:
trans-unit.target: 该示例包含四个部分：

trans-unit.source: A user control that enables you to change the Web Parts display mode on a page.
trans-unit.target: 用户控件，使你能够更改 Web 部件页面上显示模式。

trans-unit.source: Source code for an interface and two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection.
trans-unit.target: 源接口和两个代码<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制充当提供程序和连接的使用者。

trans-unit.source: A Web page to host all the controls and run the code example.
trans-unit.target: 网页上承载的控件和运行的代码示例。

trans-unit.source: An explanation of how to run the example page.
trans-unit.target: 如何运行该示例页的说明。

trans-unit.source: The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例的第一部分是使用户能够更改在网页上的显示模式的用户控件。

trans-unit.source: Save the following source code to an .ascx file, giving it the file name that is assigned to the `Src` attribute of the `Register` directive for this user control, which is near the top of the hosting Web page.
trans-unit.target: 将以下源代码保存到一个.ascx 文件中，将其分配到的文件名称`Src`属性`Register`指令为此用户控件，即托管的 Web 页面顶部附近。

trans-unit.source: For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息显示在此控件模式和源代码的说明，请参见[演练： 在 Web 部件页面上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。

trans-unit.source: The second part of the code example is the source code for the two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls that serve as the consumer and the provider for the connection, and an interface used for the connection points.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例的第二部分是对这两个源代码<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>充当使用者和提供程序连接和用于连接点的接口的控件。

trans-unit.source: For the code example to run, you must compile this source code.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。

trans-unit.source: You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache.
trans-unit.target: 你可以显式编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将动态编译运行时将源代码。

trans-unit.source: This code example uses dynamic compilation.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例使用动态编译。

trans-unit.source: For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08).
trans-unit.target: 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。

trans-unit.source: The third part of the code example is the code for the Web page that hosts the controls and demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例的第三部分是所承载控件并演示如何使用的 Web 页的代码<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: In the `Button1_Click` method, all the objects required to form a connection are created, including a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> object.
trans-unit.target: 在`Button1_Click`方法，以形成连接所需的所有对象都创建，包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>对象。

trans-unit.source: These objects are all passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A> method to create the connection.
trans-unit.target: 这些对象传递给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A>方法才能创建连接。

trans-unit.source: In the `Button2_Click` method, the code accesses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2A> property and displays some details of the connection point.
trans-unit.target: 在`Button2_Click`方法中，代码访问<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2A>属性并显示点连接的一些详细信息。

trans-unit.source: After you load the page in a browser, use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch the page to connect mode.
trans-unit.target: 加载浏览器中后，使用**显示模式**下拉列表控件，以将页切换到连接模式。

trans-unit.source: Click the verbs menu (represented by the downward arrow in the title bar) on one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, and click the connect verb.
trans-unit.target: 单击 （由标题栏中的向下箭头） 之一上的谓词菜单<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件，并单击连接谓词。

trans-unit.source: Use the **Connect WebPart Controls** button, or the provided connection UI, to create a connection between the two controls.
trans-unit.target: 使用**连接 web 部件控件**按钮或提供的连接 UI 中，创建两个控件之间的连接。

trans-unit.source: Click the **ConnectionPoint Details** button to run the code that demonstrates the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 单击**连接点的详细信息**按钮以运行演示代码<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the property value on a connection that references the ID of the object serving as the consumer connection point for that connection.
A string that contains the ID for the consumer connection point.
trans-unit.target: 点包含的使用者连接的 ID 的字符串。

trans-unit.source: For a static connection declared in the markup of a Web page, developers can specify which consumer connection point will be used for the connection by assigning a value to the `ConsumerConnectionPointID` attribute on the `<asp:webpartconnection>` element.
trans-unit.target: 对于在网页上的标记中声明静态连接，开发人员可以指定的使用者连接点将用于通过分配到的值连接`ConsumerConnectionPointID`属性`<asp:webpartconnection>`元素。

trans-unit.source: If a value is not assigned to the attribute, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint.DefaultID> property value is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果值不分配给该属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint.DefaultID>使用属性值。

trans-unit.source: When you create dynamic (programmatic) connections, normally you should not set the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ConsumerConnectionPointID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在创建动态 （编程） 的连接时，通常不应将的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ConsumerConnectionPointID%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: You can simply call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control, passing to it the consumer and consumer connection point objects (along with the other required parameters), and that method determines the correct ID to use for the consumer's connection point.
trans-unit.target: 你可以轻松调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件中，将传递给它的使用者和使用者连接点对象，（以及其他必需的参数），而该方法将确定正确的 ID，用于使用者的连接点。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, when you disconnect, you can call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A> method without needing to specify the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ConsumerConnectionPointID%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 同样，如果在断开连接时，你可以调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A>方法而无需指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ConsumerConnectionPointID%2A>属性值。

trans-unit.source: The ID of a consumer's connection point can be determined when you designate a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server control as a consumer.
trans-unit.target: 当你指定时，可以确定使用者的连接点的 ID<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>或其他服务器控件充当使用者。

trans-unit.source: You must identify a method in the consumer that retrieves an instance of an interface furnished by either a provider control or a transformer.
trans-unit.target: 你必须确定检索的提供者控件或转换器提供的接口的实例的使用者中的方法。

trans-unit.source: To identify the method, mark it with the `ConnectionConsumer` code attribute.
trans-unit.target: 若要标识的方法，将其与标记`ConnectionConsumer`code 属性。

trans-unit.source: When you add this attribute, you can add an optional string value parameter that serves as an ID for the consumer's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> object.
trans-unit.target: 当添加此属性时，你可以添加一个可选的字符串值参数，作为使用者的 ID<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>对象。

trans-unit.source: If you supply a value for the optional ID parameter, that value becomes the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ConsumerConnectionPointID%2A> property for the connection.
trans-unit.target: 如果你提供可选的 ID 参数的值，该值将成为的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ConsumerConnectionPointID%2A>连接的属性。

trans-unit.source: If you do not supply an ID value, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint.DefaultID> property value is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供的 ID 值，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint.DefaultID>使用属性值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the declarative and programmatic use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ConsumerConnectionPointID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示了声明性和以编程方式利用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ConsumerConnectionPointID%2A>属性。

trans-unit.target: 请注意，在页标记中，声明连接使用`<StaticConnections>`和`<asp:WebPartsConnection>`元素。

trans-unit.source: The connection declaration includes the required `ConsumerConnectionPointID` attribute.

trans-unit.source: A second method for creating the connection appears in the `Button1_Click` method, where the code creates a new connection, using the connection point defined in the consumer control.
trans-unit.target: 用于创建连接的第二个方式出现在`Button1_Click`方法，该代码在其中创建新的连接，使用在使用者控件中定义的连接点。

trans-unit.source: Then, in the `Button2_Click` method, the code accesses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ConsumerConnectionPointID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 然后，在`Button2_Click`方法中，代码访问<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ConsumerConnectionPointID%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Enter some text in the provider control, and note that it is displayed in the consumer due to the connection.
trans-unit.target: 在提供程序控件中，输入一些文本，并记下它将显示在由于连接的使用者。

trans-unit.target: 接下来，断开的控件。

trans-unit.source: Click the verbs menu (represented by the downward arrow in the title bar) on one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, and click the connect verb.

trans-unit.source: Click the **Disconnect** button.
trans-unit.target: 单击**断开连接**按钮。

trans-unit.source: Use the **Connect WebPart Controls** button to recreate a connection between the two controls.
trans-unit.target: 使用**连接 web 部件控件**按钮以重新创建两个控件之间的连接。

trans-unit.source: Click the **ConnectionPoint Details** button to run the code that accesses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ConsumerConnectionPointID%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 单击**连接点的详细信息**按钮以运行访问代码<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ConsumerConnectionPointID%2A>属性值。

trans-unit.source: The value is written out in a label below the controls.
trans-unit.target: 在控件的下方的标签中情况下，值写出。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the property value on a connection that references the ID of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control acting as a consumer for that connection.
A string that contains the ID of the control acting as a consumer in a connection.
trans-unit.target: 包含控件充当连接中使用者的 ID 的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ConsumerID%2A> property value is required when you create a connection between <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ConsumerID%2A>属性值是必需的当你创建之间的连接时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: If a value is not assigned to the property, an exception is thrown when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control attempts to activate the connection.
trans-unit.target: 如果值未分配给该属性，将引发异常时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件尝试激活连接。

trans-unit.target: 单击 （由标题栏中的向下箭头） 之一上的谓词菜单<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件，并单击连接谓词。

trans-unit.target: 单击**使用者详细信息**按钮以运行访问代码<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ConsumerID%2A>属性值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ID of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> object.
A string that contains the ID of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，包含的 ID <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" />。

trans-unit.source: Every <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object has a unique value assigned to its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 每个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>对象具有唯一值分配给其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ID%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This is to ensure that there is a way to distinguish between multiple connections.
trans-unit.target: 这是为了确保没有一种方法来区分多个连接。

trans-unit.source: If you create a static connection by declaring an `<asp:webpartconnection>` element in a Web page, and you do not assign a value to the `ID` attribute for the connection, an exception is thrown when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control attempts to activate the connection.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过声明创建静态连接`<asp:webpartconnection>`元素在网页上，并且你不将值赋给`ID`时，将引发连接异常属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件尝试激活连接。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control creates a new dynamic connection, it calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateDynamicConnectionID%2A> method to generate a unique ID for the connection.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件创建一个新的动态连接时，它调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateDynamicConnectionID%2A>方法来生成连接的唯一 ID。

trans-unit.target: 单击**连接详细信息**按钮以运行访问代码<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ID%2A>属性值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> object is currently established and able to exchange data between its provider and consumer controls.
<see langword="true" /> if the connection is active; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果连接处于活动状态;否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsActive%2A> property indicates a state of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsActive%2A>属性指示的状态<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>对象。

trans-unit.source: When the connection is in this state, the provider and consumer controls in the connection are communicating and able to exchange data through a common interface or a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> object.
trans-unit.target: 此状态连接时，连接中的提供程序和使用者的控件进行通信，并且能够交换通过公共接口的数据或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>对象。

trans-unit.source: When a user views a rendered page that includes an established connection in normal browse mode, the connection is typically active (unless it failed to be activated due to some conflict or other issue when the page loaded).
trans-unit.target: 当用户查看呈现的页面，其中包含已建立的连接中正常浏览模式时，则将连接通常 active （除非它无法在加载页面时被激活由于某些冲突或其他问题）。

trans-unit.source: In the early stages of the page and control life cycle, the property value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 在页和控件的生命周期的早期阶段，该属性值将`false`。

trans-unit.source: The connection is activated just after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectionsActivated> event on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control is raised.
trans-unit.target: 该连接将紧后面激活<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectionsActivated>上的事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>引发控件。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, the connection is activated after the consumer has retrieved an instance of the specified interface from the provider or a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> object.
trans-unit.target: 具体而言，该连接将激活后使用者是否已从提供程序检索指定的接口的实例或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>对象。

trans-unit.source: It is useful to know whether a connection is active in situations where there might be conflicts or synchronization issues due to multiple connections on a page.
trans-unit.target: 它是有助于你了解连接是否处于活动状态的情况下可能出现冲突或由于页上的多个连接的同步问题的位置。

trans-unit.source: For example, if there is some kind of conflict between two connections, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control has the option of not activating one of the connections to avoid the conflict.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果没有某种类型的两个连接之间的冲突<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件可以选择不激活的多个连接，以避免冲突。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsActive%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The example has three parts:

trans-unit.target: 源接口和两个代码<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制充当提供程序和连接的使用者。

trans-unit.source: A Web page to host all the controls and run the code example.
trans-unit.target: 网页上承载的控件和运行的代码示例。

trans-unit.target: 如何运行该示例页的说明。

trans-unit.source: The first part of the code example is the source code for the interface, and the consumer and provider controls.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例的第一部分是接口，以及使用者和提供程序控件的源代码。

trans-unit.target: 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。

trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将动态编译运行时将源代码。

trans-unit.source: This code example uses dynamic compilation.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例使用动态编译。

trans-unit.source: For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08).
trans-unit.target: 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。

trans-unit.source: The second part of the code example is the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例的第二部分是网页。

trans-unit.source: Near the top is a `Register` directive that refers to the source code for the two dynamically compiled <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 顶部附近，有`Register`指的是两个动态编译的源代码的指令<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: The static connection is declared within the `<StaticConnections>` element on the page.
trans-unit.target: 在中声明静态连接`<StaticConnections>`页面上的元素。

trans-unit.source: Within the `<script>` element are four event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 在`<script>`元素是四个事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Each event handler checks the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsActive%2A> property on the static connection, and writes a message to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control indicating whether the connection is active or inactive at that state of the page and control life cycle.
trans-unit.target: 每个事件处理程序检查的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsActive%2A>属性静态连接，并将消息写入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>，该值指示连接在该状态页和控件的生命周期中是否为活动或非活动的控件。

trans-unit.source: This demonstrates at what point the connection becomes active, and that it remains active after the page is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示在哪一时间点连接将变为活动状态，并且，它将保持活动页后面呈现。

trans-unit.source: Load the page in a browser.
trans-unit.target: 加载浏览器中的页。

trans-unit.source: The static connection is already created, and messages have already been written to the labels showing whether the connection was active at various points in the page and control life cycle.
trans-unit.target: 已创建静态连接，并且消息已写入显示是否页和控件的生命周期中处于活动状态的不同位置已连接的标签。

trans-unit.source: Click the **Connection Details** button, and note that the connection is not active at that point, but that the connection is reactivated each time after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectionsActivated> event, and that it is still active (and will remain so) after the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender> event of the page.
trans-unit.target: 单击**连接详细信息**按钮，然后请注意，此连接不是活动在该点，但连接被重新激活后每次<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectionsActivated>事件，并且，它仍处于活动状态 （会保持操作） 后<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>页的事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> object is visible to all users or only to the current user.
<see langword="true" /> if the connection is shared; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果连接共享;，否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: As with individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object can be a shared or a per-user instance.
trans-unit.target: 个人与<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>对象可以是共享或每个用户实例。

trans-unit.source: A shared instance means that the connection is visible to all users of a Web page, and a per-user instance means the connection is visible only to a specific user.
trans-unit.target: 共享的实例表示的连接是可见的网页上，所有用户，每个用户实例表示的连接是只对特定用户可见。

trans-unit.source: In general, the way a connection is added to a page determines whether the connection is shared.
trans-unit.target: 一般情况下，连接将会添加到页的方式确定是否共享的连接。

trans-unit.source: If the connection is declared in the markup of a Web page, then the connection is shared and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared%2A> property value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 Web 网页、 的标记中声明连接，则共享的连接和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared%2A>属性值是`true`。

trans-unit.source: In addition, if the Web page is in shared personalization scope when a connection is added, the connection is also shared.
trans-unit.target: 此外，如果添加连接时，Web 页被共享个性化设置作用域中，连接也会共享。

trans-unit.source: Typically, when a user uses the `<asp:connectionszone>` user interface (UI) to add a connection, the page is in user personalization scope, so the connection is not shared and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared%2A> property value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，当用户使用`<asp:connectionszone>`用户界面 (UI) 来添加连接时，页上已在用户个性化设置作用域，因此不共享的连接和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared%2A>属性值是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates programmatic use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式使用的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: A user control that enables you to change the Web Parts display mode on a page.

trans-unit.target: 源接口和两个代码<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制充当提供程序和连接的使用者。

trans-unit.source: A Web page to host all the controls and run the code example.
trans-unit.target: 网页上承载的控件和运行的代码示例。

trans-unit.source: An entry in the Web.config file that is required to run the example.
trans-unit.target: 运行示例所需的 Web.config 文件中的条目。

trans-unit.source: An explanation of how to run the example page.
trans-unit.target: 如何运行该示例页的说明。

trans-unit.target: 此代码示例的第一部分是使用户能够更改在网页上的显示模式的用户控件。

trans-unit.source: Save the following source code to an .ascx file, giving it the file name that is assigned to the `Src` attribute of the `Register` directive for this user control, which is near the top of the hosting Web page.
trans-unit.target: 将以下源代码保存到一个.ascx 文件中，将其分配到的文件名称`Src`属性`Register`指令为此用户控件，即托管的 Web 页面顶部附近。

trans-unit.source: For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息显示在此控件模式和源代码的说明，请参见[演练： 在 Web 部件页面上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。

trans-unit.source: The second part of the code example is the source code for the interface, and the consumer and provider controls.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例的第二部分是为接口和使用者和提供程序的控件的源代码。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将动态编译运行时将源代码。

trans-unit.target: 此代码示例使用动态编译。

trans-unit.target: 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。

trans-unit.source: The third part of the code example is the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例的第三部分是网页。

trans-unit.source: In the `Button2_Click` method, it checks the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared%2A> property of the existing connection and displays the result on the page.
trans-unit.target: 在`Button2_Click`方法，它会检查<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared%2A>的现有连接的属性，并在页上显示结果。

trans-unit.source: The fourth part of the code example is an entry in the Web.config file that is required for the user account that will be running the example to be able to edit the page in shared personalization scope.
trans-unit.target: 代码示例的第四个部分是将运行示例后，若要能够编辑共享个性化设置范围中的页的用户帐户需要的 Web.config 文件中的条目。

trans-unit.source: To enable this, you must have an entry in the Web.config file within the `<system.web>` section that looks like the following example.
trans-unit.target: 若要启用此功能，必须具有一个条目在 Web.config 文件内`<system.web>`如以下示例所示的部分。

trans-unit.source: After you load the page in a browser, use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch the page to connect display mode.
trans-unit.target: 加载浏览器中后，使用**显示模式**下拉列表控件，以将页切换到连接的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: Click the **Connect WebPart Controls** button to form a connection.
trans-unit.target: 单击**连接 web 部件控件**按钮以形成连接。

trans-unit.source: Next, click the **Connection Details** button to display whether the connection is shared.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，单击**连接详细信息**按钮以显示是否共享的连接。

trans-unit.source: If you created the connection with the page in the default user personalization scope, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared%2A> property value should be `false` for the connection.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用默认的用户个性化设置作用域中的页创建连接<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared%2A>属性值应为`false`连接。

trans-unit.source: On the verbs menu of one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls (indicated by the downward arrow in the title bar), click the connect verb.
trans-unit.target: 谓词菜单中的其中一个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件 （由标题栏中的向下箭头指示），单击连接谓词。

trans-unit.source: When the connection UI appears, click the **Disconnect** button to end the connection.
trans-unit.target: 连接 UI 出现时，单击**断开连接**按钮终止连接。

trans-unit.source: Use the **Display Mode** control to return the page to browse mode.
trans-unit.target: 使用**显示模式**控件来返回到浏览模式的页。

trans-unit.source: In the **Display Mode** control, select the **Shared** option to switch the page into shared personalization scope.
trans-unit.target: 在**显示模式**控件中，选择**共享**选项以将页切换到共享个性化设置作用域。

trans-unit.source: Follow the same steps as those above to create a connection, and again click the **Connection Details** button to display whether the connection is shared.
trans-unit.target: 请按照与这些上面创建的连接，并再次单击相同的步骤**连接详细信息**按钮以显示是否共享的连接。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared%2A> property should be `true`.
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared%2A>属性应为`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> object is declared in the markup of a Web page, or created programmatically.
<see langword="true" /> if the connection is static; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果连接是静态的;否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Connections between Web Parts controls can be either static or dynamic.
trans-unit.target: Web 部件控件之间的连接可以是静态或动态。

trans-unit.source: A static connection is declared in the markup of a Web page, using an `<asp:WebPartConnection>` element.
trans-unit.target: 在网页中，标记中声明静态连接使用`<asp:WebPartConnection>`元素。

trans-unit.source: Dynamic connections are created programmatically or when a user creates a connection through the user interface (UI) defined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control.
trans-unit.target: 以编程方式创建动态连接或当用户创建一个通过由定义的用户界面 (UI) 的连接<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>控件。

trans-unit.source: Static connections are shared objects, meaning they are available to all users of the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 静态连接都共享的对象，这意味着它们将可供所有用户的网页。

trans-unit.source: Also, they are essentially permanent because, like a static <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, they cannot be permanently deleted.
trans-unit.target: 此外，它们是实质上是永久因为，如静态<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件，它们不能被永久删除。

trans-unit.source: While a static connection object cannot be permanently deleted, it can be permanently disconnected.
trans-unit.target: 虽然静态连接对象不能被永久删除，它可以被永久断开。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the disconnected object would exist on the server, but an end user would never be aware of the object's existence in a page.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，断开连接的对象将存在于服务器，但最终用户永远不会注意在页中的对象存在。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control that acts as the provider in a Web Parts connection.
A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> that acts as the provider of data.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />充当数据的提供程序。

trans-unit.source: Every Web Parts connection consists of two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls--a consumer and a provider--and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.Provider%2A> property returns a reference to the provider control in a connection.
trans-unit.target: 每个 Web 部件连接包含两个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件-使用者和提供程序--和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.Provider%2A>属性返回中连接到提供程序控件的引用。

trans-unit.source: Like its counterpart in a connection (the consumer control), the provider control is required to establish a connection.
trans-unit.target: 连接 （使用者控件） 中其对应项，如提供程序控件需要建立连接。

trans-unit.source: Whether you create the connection programmatically, or by declaring it in page persistence format, you must specify a control to act as the provider for a connection.
trans-unit.target: 是否以编程方式，或通过声明以页持久性格式创建连接，你必须指定一个控件，用于充当用于连接的提供程序。

trans-unit.target: 请注意，在`<asp:webpartconnection>`元素，`ProviderID`属性具有分配给它的提供者控件的 ID。

trans-unit.target: 这是标识提供程序的静态连接所需的。

trans-unit.target: `Button1_Click`方法访问<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.Provider%2A>属性和一些其详细信息将写入一个标签。

trans-unit.target: 已创建静态连接。

trans-unit.source: Enter some text in the provider control, and note that the text is displayed in the consumer control.
trans-unit.target: 在提供程序控件中，输入一些文本，并请注意，在使用者控件中显示的文本。
